name: HOMERUN (AlfonsoM)
description:
HOMElessRUN it's a top-down 2D action game for 3 Players where the first homeless to get the cardbox at the end of the passage wins. But be aware! The Capitalism is watching you and is willing to stop you from taking the holy cardbox! 

Play as BOB the stinky or JOHN the beggar and avoid being knocked by the hazards along the passage.. or play as The Big C and trigger elements in the path of the homeless to avoid them to take what's yours!
(Interactable objects will be shining and highlighted on mouse over)

Hint: Both homeless can boost themselfs for a brief period but be careful! At the end of the boost they will be damaged!

Controls:

- Player 1: Play as BOB using WASD (Left shift to boost)
- Player 2: Play as JOHN using arrow keys (Right Shift to boost)
- Player 3: Play as Capitalism using the mouse 

* Press ESC to pause the game * (Police)

Tip: Play it on full screen!

Tip2: There are two different passages, they will be loaded randomly.

Disclaimer: No homeless was hurt during this game

A message from the team: We apologize if someone feels hurt with the theme.
